title: Little Dreamerz
overview: Gunwoo, whoâ€™s been struggling with a failing business, meets a little boy named Yosup who turns out to be a creature of dreams. Gunwoo sees a precognitive dream and wins at sports betting. Gunwoo meets a high school girl named Mina while he was trying to find Yosup to see the future again. They find it hard to understand each other, but end up going on a strange journey together.
